bibl.title: A Wax Tablet in the Moen Collection.
bibl.note: Side I. Exercise written by a person training to become a professional scribe, perhaps a first draft of a real contract of loan. - Side II. A multiplication table and three lines of writing (an exercise of individual letters or words?). Abu el-Fadl (?), vith/viith cent.
Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, A Wax Tablet in the Moen Collection.
143.4 T. Coll. priv√©es: T. Moen Inv. 601
